main event: Two Air Police patrols reported a very bright light in the sky that appeared to travel in a zig-zag path across the sky.
interesting points: The object was reported to be extremely bright, brighter than any known aircraft light., The object was observed under visual conditions until it disappeared at a high rate of speed., The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes., The object had varied course maneuvers during the observation., Conclusive analysis indicated that it was probably a B-52 aircraft reflecting sunlight, creating an unusual appearance.
sighted object: a very bright light in the sky
